title: Can't Log in
body: I got kicked right before entering a game (as countdown hit 0, before loading screen), now i can't log in.  Am I going to get leaverbuster? I see that you're having network errors but it won't let me log in period.  "Unknown error" or "cannot connect to login queue" are the only things i can see

replies.body:
Your case sounds like a network problem that's failing to reach the game server.  It's hard to say if it's a local issue, ISP, or even the current live maintenance being performed per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  If this is still happening for you, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities of local issues or  a setting that might have changed and causing this block.

Let me know the results, and we can go from there.
Oh my god this is the first time a Rioter has posted on a topic I've created.  Btw it started working AS SOON as I made this thread. smh
Anytime I load the client it shuts down when I click launch, I'm assuming its per maintenance. Great start to my day off.

Are you on a mac or pc?  The client failing to launch is usually a crash in the background that would require a pc restart, or security setting blocking league from launching.  In such a case, I recommend going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is restored and league is added as an exception once again.
An hour ago, they updated a notification about some live maintenance happening at that time. Although the client should be working fine as it was a network maintenance of the game
I just did log in after that last comment.  Give it a try m8.
I cant even log in at all.  Need to change that server status if people cant log in.
